titleStmt.title: The substance of that vvhich was deliuered in a sermon before the Commons House of Parliament, in St. Margarets Church at Westminster, the 18. of February, 1620. By Iames Vssher, Professor of Diuinity in the Uniuersity of Dublin, in Ireland
titleStmt.author: Ussher, James, 1581-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Felix Kyngston, for Iohn Bartlet: and are to be sold at the signe of the gilded Cup, in the Goldsmiths Rowe in Cheapside,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A sermon preached before the Commons House of Parliament.
Identified as STC 24556 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the signe of the gilded Cup, in the Goldsmiths Rowe in Cheapside
